value.title: Infosys ties with Microsoft for industry-wide adoption of generative artificial intelligence
value.excerpt: Infosys collaborates with Microsoft to develop AI solutions, leveraging Infosys Topaz, Azure OpenAI Service, and Azure Cognitive Services. The integrated solutions aim to enhance enterprise functions and accelerate the democratization of data and intelligence.

value.title: Coles accelerates application deployments with Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: When it comes to customer feedback, Coles wanted to integrate productive updates and changes as quickly as possible to address friction points, add new features, and streamline processes. With Azure DevOps, Coles has been able to achieve efficiency by shifting from monthly to weekly deployments.

value.title: Infosys and Microsoft collaborate to drive adoption of generative AI
